page.title: 01WILLINGDON
page.content: The area designated "Willingdon" comprises part of the South Downs,Upper and Lower Willingdon, Willingdon Trees and part of Polegate. A spur of the South Downs separates Upper from Lower Willingdon.The former is an older and more affluent area than the latter. Willingdon Trees is the most recently developed area;it is separated from the rest of Willingdon by the busy A22 road, which is rarely traversed by pedestrians except by a subway at the Triangle and at traffic lights. There is little employment in the area as a whole, other than normal service industries. Retired people form a large part of the population. The Downs do much to enhance the beauty of the area and the nearness of the sea is an added attraction of living here.
